| HistoryText             = The '''Malakim''',{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 17}} or '''Malakhim''',{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 21}} are sixth the choir of [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]] per their hierarchy in [[Judaism]].{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}

The brothers [[Emmael (Earth-616)|Emmael]] and [[Vraniel (Earth-616)|Vraniel]] were part of the Malakim.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 17}}<!-- even after the betrayal ? --> Having taken part into [[Zadkiel (Earth-616)|Zadkiel]]'s plans, they were cast out of the part of Heaven where they could hear [[Yahweh (Earth-616)|His]] voice.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 14}}

While Emmael and Vraniel tried to redeem themselves,{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 14}} Zadkiel had at his disposal a legion of Malakhim assassins in his quest to overthrow God and claim the throne of Heaven for himself by besieging it.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 21}}
